definition:
Mods can be 2 types - client side or server side, client side mods just effect the client side of the game, so mostly the visuals and server side mods effect the code of the game / what the game does. Most mods you will encounter here are technical tools to help players build and debug complex redstone. An example of a server side mod is sodium, which improves game performance, whilst litematica a client side mod is mostly visual and helps the player build. 
Recommended Mods -
Litematica
Sodium
Carpet
Carpet TIS
Client Commands
G4meSpeed
Isometric Renders
Item Scroller
Minihud
Pistorder
Tech Utils
Tweakeroo
TweakerMore
ViafabricPlus
Axiom
